item.title: emacs
item.description: Topics How to remove empty lines in region Select what you want to change, or C-x h to select the whole buffer. Then: M-x flush-lines RET followed by ^$ RET or ^[[ : space : ]]*$ RET ^[[ : space : ]]*$ contain the meta-characters: ^ for beginning of string, $ for end of string, Tag multiple headers in a region Select region run M-x org-change-tag-in-region Remove read-only lock in a buffer C-x C-q
